snippet: Morton A. Pierce, the former vice chairman of Dewey & LeBoeuf, is said to have informed the firm's leaders in his resignation letter that he is owed the money.
abstract: Morton A. Pierce, the former vice chairman of Dewey & LeBoeuf, is said to have informed the firm's leaders in his resignation letter that he is owed the money.

headline.main: Ex-Vice Chairman at Dewey Is Said to Claim That He Is Owed $61 Million
headline.print_headline: Ex-Vice Chairman at Dewey Is Said to Claim He Is Owed $61 Million
